I'm white and I don't bitch about color changes. All I gotta say is be happy that you got your favorite version and STFU about the others you hate.

Guys, stop it.

We are here for one purpose, so let's just nut in peace.

Well, not in November though.

Haha, I responded to one of the trolls. You got me you sum a bitch. I decided to check how many of the people making these racist remarks are actual accounts to verify if it is just people trolling & yes, a good chunk of the accounts were made within the last 1-2 weeks with nothing added to their favorites.

@howdidigetherehelpme You are doing some serious mental gymnastic there buddy.1.) There are 5 different colored variation so unless this guy has 4 different skin colors & none of them is black I gotta call bs on a realistic level. 2.) You proved me right by contradicting yourself with your crazy projection claiming they're insecure/racist dudes without actual evidence unless you're referring to the people making purposeful race-baiting insults which I suspect are just trolls considering this site is full of meme-ers 3.) I'm fairly certain the only people that actually get bother enough about there being different skin variants of the same work are the SJW so there's plenty of reason to come to that conclusions with the whole making claims that whoever makes a re-skin variants of a project is apparently insecure/racists. My last response on this subject as I doubt anyone gonna make a valid argument because it's easier to just make ad hominems versus using logic/common sense.
Thanks for the recolor!

>Be a nigger call someone fragile
>Get triggered by the recolors depsite numerous pictures on gelbooru and rule 34 xxx having their skin color changed to black
This is why blacks are low iq morons who were forced to pick cotton black fragility at it's best.

Nobody's complaining about the recolor, we're laughing at these insecure/racist dudes who apparently can't handle black dudes existing in a porn comic lmao.

Bet you 99% of the dudes reading this comic aren't here to jack it to the dudes, so why does it even matter what their skin color is, unless you're really that pathetic lmao.

And there's even a dude getting mad at sjws for no reason lmaooooo this is rich

I'm pretty sure the people being insecure are the ones complaining about it. I'm gonna bet if they re-skinned the girls you guys would hardly be raising a tantrum & now I'm actually wondering if they plan on doing that or just the guys.

It's like people getting upset over a guy/girl on a dating app requesting only certain ethnicity or whining over a filter for just that reason because that's them being, 'insecure' or 'racist' lol.
lol white people insecure

Hahaha you sissies are so insecure you had to recolor! Hahahaha I'm fucking dying! Lmao. You're dick ain't gonna get any bigger because you hate black people. Women won't find you anymore attractive because you hate black people. You won't be cooler, taller or richer because you hate black people. And you won't feel any better about your shitty pathetic lives because you hate black people. You are a loser and complainer and you have my sympathy. Better luck next life.
